dialogue.start: Those damn basterd crabs took my wife from me! I'll never forgive them for what they've done to her and me. One of them swallowed my sword while fighting them off before they got to my beloved wife. I can't rest while they're out there walking and pinching there pincers. Avenge my wife and bring me tere pincers and I'll see to it you're rewarded well.
dialogue.active: You must give the crabbers the stabbers! Go and avenge my wife!
dialogue.completed: Well done! You have a knack for combat. The coast is made safer because of you, I can rest easy now that this won't happen to someone else. Here's your reward, you've earned it.
dialogue.delivered: Isn't it the crab slayer! How ya doing!?
